CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 21, 1955, pg. 7 reads: "Gay Ninettes Party, Show-The Gay Ninettes Club shown in top photo, held a cocktail party and fashion show at the Greene Hearth last Sunday...Members of the group who appear in the top picture are Ida Lee Vance, teens vice-president; Flossie Bryant, Berthene Edmondson, president; Mary Alunlop, assistant secretary; Thelma Hoden, social chairman; Veruon Melontice, social chairman, and Dorothy Williams, secretary....-Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of  seven members of the Gay Ninettes Club; Ida Lee Vance, Flossie Bryant, Berthene Edmondson, Mary Alunlop,Thelma Hoden, Veruon Melontice, and Dorothy Williams, standing in interior of the Greene Hearth for fashion show
